text: This is an article about the years 50 AD to 59 AD. Sometimes, the 50s is used for the 1950s. == Events and trends == *The Roman emperor Claudius is murdered in (54). Nero be comes emperor. *Buddhism comes to China through the Emperor Ming of Han China == Significant people == *Claudius, Roman Emperor (41–54). *Nero, Roman Emperor (54–68). *Kujula Kadphises, Kushan emperor *Saint Paul, Christian evangelist *Emperor Ming of Han China == Births == * Juvenal, Roman poet. * Domitian, Emperor of Rome == Deaths == *Claudius, Emperor of Rome *Agrippina the younger, mother of Nero
title: 50s
